summary:
Global Retail and Institutional Financial Services,
Investment Advisory Services, Business Development Consulting, 
Investor Relations, Corporate Governance

profile_positions.description: Investment advice services for high net worth individuals and their companies. The main business lines  are: a) spotting high return investment projects and assisting in establishing investment proposals; b) consultations on management policies such us Investor relations, Corporate governance, Risk management, Internal control and Social corporate responsibility.
profile_positions.title: Independent Consultant

profile_positions.description: Was misled as management and ownership changed.
profile_positions.title: Sales Director

company.name: CJSC Kyrgyz Investment Credit Bank.  Shareholders: EBRD, KfW/DEG, Aga Khan Foundation, Habib Bank

profile_positions.company: CJSC Kyrgyz Investment Credit Bank.  Shareholders: EBRD, KfW/DEG, Aga Khan Foundation, Habib Bank
profile_positions.description:
Within this position I was responsible for:

	Negotiation of acquiring insurance company. The deal with insurance company was successful in terms of price and conditions.

	Enhancing credit policy for retail and corporate customers as well as risk management policy and mobile banking development.

	 Communication with financial development and investment institutions. As a result KfW housing program were entered.

	Communication with shareholders and regulating bodies. 

	Corporate Social Responsibility policy, structuring the relationships with social organizations and donors and arrangement of social events.
profile_positions.title: CEO Senior Assistant

company.name: Construction business.  External and internal design refurbishment.

profile_positions.company: Construction business.  External and internal design refurbishment.
profile_positions.description:
Main business lines:

	Refurbishment of private apartments and houses. As a result we finished 20 refurbishment contracts.

	Contractor for new elite village construction. Five houses have been fully finished exterior.
profile_positions.title: Owner of construction design company

company.name: IFC - International Finance Corporation Central Asia Corporate Governance Project

profile_positions.company: IFC - International Finance Corporation Central Asia Corporate Governance Project
profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for:

	Conducting corporate governance seminars and presentations for financial institutions. As a result we assisted to draw the CG policy for major banks and pension funds. The pilot full scale CG project was started with TuranAlem Bank. 

	Designing the internal control contemplate for financial institutions. The contemplate was published in IFC Central Asia CG project website. 

	Designing Corporate Governance Code for Kazakhstan Stock Exchange. This CG code was mostly accepted and now in use.
profile_positions.title: Banking/finance expert

company.name: Development Bank of Kazakhstan (founded in aim to support non-oil economy sectors)

profile_positions.company: Development Bank of Kazakhstan (founded in aim to support non-oil economy sectors)
profile_positions.description:
Within this position I was managing a team of five officers, this ensured that monthly targets are met, as well as fair distribution of tasks and effective communication among all staff members. My direct responsibilities were:

	Securing the funding base for the bank’s lending operations by means of:

	Issuing  Eurobonds in frames of  EMTN program for the aggregate amount of 300M USD. All bonds made region benchmarks in terms of coupon (7%, 6,5% and 6%) and in terms of maturity (10,15 and 20 years).

	Attracting international syndicated and bilateral loans as well as state budget loans. The portfolio was gradually improved in terms of cost and maturity. 

	Arranging Pre-export finance for agricultural customers. 

	Attracting Export Credit Agencies covered loans for agricultural and production customers. 

	Arranging project finance for largest electrolysis plant. Though at the end we did not participated in the project as main arranger, nevertheless we were involved as arrangers of bridge loans and as co-lenders. 

	Securitization finance for electricity grid state company. Though the whole project was postponed we had the opportunity to learn thoroughly this instrument and prepared all financial estimations.

	Decreasing cost of funding base. As a result most of the repayment schedules of our customers were aligned with repayment schedules of each instrument in the borrowing portfolio. 

	Collaborations with rating agencies (Standard and Poor’s, Fitch Ratings and Moody's Investors Service) 

	Conducted presentations and consultations for the credit department as well as for Board of Directors and management on funding instruments. 

	Participating in designing cost-evaluating model for funding base. 

	Member of ALCO, Risk, Remuneration and Credit Committees
profile_positions.title: Head of borrowing and structured finance Department

volunteer_experiences.role: planting trees within the green foundation movement at KICB

company.name: CJSC Kyrgyz Investment and Credit Bank

volunteer_experiences.description: Establishing a foundation papers for Green Foundation. Inviting other sponsors. Planting trees.
planting new trees, keeping park clean, keeping trees healthy, arranging seminars and attracting other participants.
